title._content: Image taken from page 44 of 'Boston and the West. How to connect their industries and interests, etc. [Prepared by a committee appointed at a public meeting to inquire into the best means of connecting the East and the West by another railroad.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Boston and the West. How to connect their industries and interests, etc. [Prepared by a committee appointed at a public meeting to inquire into the best means of connecting the East and the West by another railroad.]", "Reports and Memorials issued by Mixed Bodies of Citizens" Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10408.dd.3.(6.)" Page: 44 Place of Publishing: Boston Date of Publishing: 1875 Publisher: Wright & Potter Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000423719 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
